nodes.text: During research into crystalline properties and crystals, the Geonosian hives operated a facility on the crystal planet of Mygeeto. When conducting research on a crystal codenamed Hammertong, the Geonosians outsourced it to the facility. The facility was be mentioned years later by Colonel Haxen Delto to General Davits Draven of the intelligence branch of the Alliance to Restore the Republic, when Delto sent a report to Draven about the relationship between Geonosians and a supposed Ultimate Weapon, and the activities that the Galactic Empire were taking part in to possibly build a superweapon.
